name: 陳映竹
objective:
Course Description 
Pre-design studies, precipitation softening, coagulation and flocculation, sedimentation, filtration, sludge handling, chlorination, chloramination, ozonation; plant hydraulics, flow measurement, pumps, instrumentation and control, tertiary treatment. 

Course Goals 
Study the principles and design of water treatment processes, including coagulation, flocculation, sedimentation, filtration, disinfection (chlorination, chloramination, ozonation), advanced oxidation, and membrane filtration. Study different phases of water treatment design, regulations pertaining to drinking water, and contemporary topics such as DBP control and emerging contaminants.
